promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple gecko steel-type pokemon holding a ancient shield. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Shieldzard, a a chibi young simple gecko steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Dual Blades, Energy Press. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "steel" or "Shieldzard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, gecko-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Shieldzard, the Mini Armor lizard, thrives in arid landscapes. With its Dual Blades and Energy Press, it skillfully fends off foes while basking in sunlight.
